operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO apps (api_id, api_hash, title, short_name) VALUES (:api_id, :api_hash, :title, :short_name)

operation.name: SelectById
operation.sql: select id, api_id, api_hash, title, short_name from apps where id=:id

operation.name: Update
operation.sql: update apps set title = :title where id=:id
